title: Parle always disappoint me. Not the first time. It happens to me earlier also.
selftext: Fungus is very common problem nowadays specially in parle biscuit. Please be aware of this while eating please look before you eat or give to your small baby.
comments: I am more dissappointed with the fact that of all the places you could've chosen to place these biscuits on and click a pic, you chose your laptop's keypad.
I don't think that's fungus; it's sugar bloom. Common with lots of chocolate chip cookies
I doubt it's fungus. If it was it would've been on the whole biscuit right and not just the choco chips? It's probably sugar bloom on the chocolates. But I'm a visual eater and I wouldn't eat it too.

You’re Goddamn Right.

That’s 99.1% pure crystal sugar.
